title: Overdose
author: Pseudome
citation: Pseudome. "Overdose: experience with Tramadol (Ultram) (ID 81951)". Erowid.org. Oct 28, 2009. erowid.org/exp/81951
footer:

report: Well, this drug just sucks. I took 3 50mg Ultram tablets and an hour later I was convulsing and ended up in the hospital until 5 in the morning. I had no noticeable effects before I had a seizure.
